div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li: Import all the codes that are contained in http://cts.nlm.nih.gov/fhir/ValueSet/2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.877
Import all the codes that are contained in http://cts.nlm.nih.gov/fhir/ValueSet/2.16.840.1.113762.1.4.1021.103

description.value: The codes for the concepts 'Unknown', 'Asked but no answer', 'other, and the 41 [CDC ethnicity codes](http://www.cdc.gov/phin/resources/vocabulary/index.html) that are grouped under one of the 2 OMB ethnicity category codes.
